column1: Funeral Services for Mrs. Hickey are scheduled to be conducted from the Carthage Chapel of Bass Funeral Homes on Tuesday
column3: 2015 at 11AM with Eld. James Thomas Gibbs officiating. Interment will follow in the Smith County Memorial Gardens.  Visitation with the Hickey family will be held at the Carthage Chapel of Bass Funeral Homes on Monday from 3PM until 8PM and again on Tuesday from 10AM until the time of the service at 11AM.
